short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Turn any online article into a map.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: If you find an article on the web and want to summaries it in a graphical format, just click on this extension while viewing the article. Feedback is welcomed at mapitcontact@gmail.com .
